command.name: demo_capture
command.description: Captures series of screenshot or avi file. See below.

argument.name: start
argument.description: Directive that tells the client to start capturing.

argument.name: time
argument.description: Number of seconds the capturing should take. Can be float value. Must be positive. Required argument.

argument.name: avifile
argument.description: When third argument is present instead of singlescreenshot avifile will be saved. See demo_capture_codec.

argument.name: stop
argument.description: You can force the client to stop capturing before the time given by <time> argument passes.

command.remarks: See demo_capture_fps, demo_capture_codec, demo_capture_dir, demo_capture_mp3 etc.
